title: Mt. Everest expedition 1924 altimeter font
content:
I’m trying to identify the fonts on Mallory and Irvine’s altimeter from their 1924 expedition to Mt. Everest. I only have this low quality photo for refference. I have tried the identifont with no luck. Is it possible to identify the fonts based on this photo and that the font must be older than 1924?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112314im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/mallory_6041.jpg)

[link to complete picture of altimeter](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112314/http:/www.wou.edu/las/physci/poston/everest/alt-fig1.jpg)

 [‹ "Notes Soft"? non aligning numerals](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112314/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39452 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font ID Please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112314/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39450 "Go to next forum topic")
author: BjornH

comments.content: It is probably not a typeface.
